title: INSV 'Kaundinya' successfully concludes historic 18-day voyage to Oman | Video
description: The Indian Navy's indigenously built traditional stitched sailing vessel INSV Kaundinya on Wednesday successfully completed its historic 18-day voyage, arriving at Muscat in Oman. The vessel had set sail from Porbandar in Gujarat on December 29, 2025
